titleStmt.title: A sermon at the funeral of the virtuous lady, and honoured, Ann, late wife of Thomas Yarburgh, Esq . Preached on Monday, the 10th day of July, 1682. By Matthew Sutcliffe.
titleStmt.author: Sutcliffe, Matthew, 1637 or 8-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Cockerill, at the Three Legs in the Poultrey, over-against the Stocks-Market,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Three Legs in the Poultrey, over-against the Stocks-Market
